summary: FlattenLabeld is a transform that converts a binary or multi-label image into a set of unique label identifiers, assigning a distinct label to each connected component based on a specified connectivity. It processes the input data and outputs a label map where each isolated region receives its own class index.
business_intent: Enable downstream analysis by separating individual objects in segmentation masks, supporting tasks such as object counting, region-based statistics, and preparation of data for machine learning pipelines that require distinct label IDs per object.
